recipe.title: Savory Shaved Cantaloupe Salad
ingredients: Tarragon leaves and Aleppo-style pepper (for serving)
instructions: Remove rind of cantaloupe in a very thin layer with a knife; remove seeds. Cut in half and very thinly slice each piece crosswise on a mandoline or by hand to make ribbons. Arrange cantaloupe on a platter and drizzle with oil. Top with tarragon, Aleppo-style pepper, and sea salt.
